function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Outbreak of Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19)","Impact":"Threat to public health and disruption of normal social life","Mitigation":"Implementing community-based isolation measures","Technologies":"Advanced healthcare technology for testing and treatment","People":"General public, especially those in densely populated urban areas","Owner":"Government, local authorities, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Importance of community-based spatial unit","Impact":"Increased focus on the importance of community in responding to public health emergencies","Mitigation":"Implementing community-focused urban planning and public health measures","Technologies":"Urban planning technology, healthcare infrastructure, public health programs","People":"Urban planners, public health officials, local government","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Community life circle planning model","Impact":"Emphasis on the provision of basic services facilities and public living spaces within walking distance, which can help mitigate disease propagation","Mitigation":"Implementation of community life circle planning model in urban areas","Technologies":"Urban planning technology for efficient layout and design, public health infrastructure for accessibility and health services","People":"Local residents, urban planners, public health officials","Owner":"Local government, urban planning authorities, public health organizations"}]}
